name: collections::btree::map::BTreeMap::<K, V, A>::last_key_value

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<Borr.doc: Temporarily takes out another, immutable reference to the same node.

collections::btree::navigate::<impl coll.doc:
Returns the rightmost leaf edge in or underneath a node - in other words, the edge
 you need last when navigating forward (or first when navigating backward).
